name: User selects colour and size and adds product to cart
description:
As a customer
  I want to select product variants like colour and size
  So that I can add the specific product I want to the cart
descriptionHtml:
As a customer
I want to select product variants like colour and size
So that I can add the specific product I want to the cart

steps.name: And  the user selects the size "M"
And  the user clicks on the "Add to Cart" button
Then  the product with colour "Blue" and size "M" should be added to the cart
And  the cart icon should show 1 item
And  the user should see a success message confirming the product was added

labels.value: Add to cart with product variants
